attributes.action: Cancel out all debts incurred by British Citizens in the same way as Northern Rock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please prime-minister, cancel all debts to save the banks (and the nation while you're at it)

After all, if we can bale out a badly run bank whose risk taking has cost them the business, surely we can bale out all individuals who have made the same mistake.
Perhaps Northern Rock directors could be found a role in the treasury?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
